dict.acceptation: 罢工；打击；朝某一方向前进；

sent.orig: When used with this meaning, strike is more formal than hit.
sent.trans: 在用于以上意义时，strike比hit较为文雅。

sent.orig: Weakening Strike Weakening Strike improves Demonic Strike ability.
sent.trans: 弱化攻击削弱自身物理攻击增强魔力。

sent.orig: I never used to have any second thoughts. For me, a strike was a strike.
sent.trans: 我以前快是因为我直接，认为对就去做，从来不会想什么代价。

sent.orig: Glyph of Plague Strike-Your Plague Strike does additional damage for each disease on the target.
sent.trans: 瘟疫打击能造成额外伤害，因疾病数而定。

sent.orig: First strike isolated enemies; later strike concentrated enemies.
sent.trans: 先打孤立之敌，后打集中之敌。
